short_summary: Provision of Third Party Funding Agreement Management services
description: This request for proposal (RFP) will establish a list of prequalified firms and proposed resources under a framework agreement, grouped by language and closest point of departure that may be called-out for a contract under the framework agreement to provide Third Party Funding Agreement Management services to Recipients. The Department and other federal government departments may place call-outs for a contract for Third Party Funding Agreement Management services covered under the Framework Agreement. The duration of the Third Party Funding Agreement Management Framework Agreement is Two (2) years plus four (4) one-year options for renewal, for a maximum total duration of five (6) years. Bidders may propose a maximum of four (4) resources in response to this request for proposal. Each proposed resource presented will be evaluated independently.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Third Party Funding Agreement Management Services
=================================
### Key Details
--------------------------------

| Details | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Title | Provision of Third Party Funding Agreement Management Services | ACCORD CADRE POUR LA PRESTATION DE SERVICES DE SÉQUESTRE-ADMINISTRATEUR D’ENTENTES DE FINANCEMENT |
| Reference Number | cb-256-21565920 | cb-256-21565920 |
| Amendment Number | 8 | 8 |
| Solicitation Number | A410722024 | A410722024 |
| Publication Date | 2024-01-26 | 2024-01-26 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-26T18:00:00 | 2024-02-26T18:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-04-01 | 2024-04-01 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2026-03-31 | 2026-03-31 |

### Tender Description
-------------------

The Government of Canada is seeking proposals from Service Providers to establish a list of prequalified firms and proposed resources under a framework agreement for Third Party Funding Agreement Management Services. 

Under this framework agreement, Recipients may be called-out for a contract to access Third Party Funding Agreement Management services. The maximum duration of the framework agreement is two (2) years plus four (4) one-year options for renewal.

### Evaluation Criteria
------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Quality of proposed resources
* Level of ownership stake in proposed resources
* Expertise and proven track record in Third Party Funding Agreement Management
* Competitive pricing

### Key Documents
----------------

For a complete list of tender requirements and information, please refer to the following documents:

* DPMP - Replacement - Interim Directive - Final (4)
* Provision of TPFAM Services - Sol. A410722024 - QA - Bilingual
* DPMP Replacement - Interim Directive - Final
* Amendment No. 1 - TPAS TPFAM 2024 Extension to Submission Deadline
* Page A410722024
* TPAS TPFAM 2024 RFP - English
* Amendment No. 1 - SCPT GEFSA 2024 - French
* Replacement - Interim Directive - Final (3)
* TPFAM Services - Extension to Submission Deadline
